short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep sensitive information safe when sharing your screen or making a video. Ideal for creators, professionals, and educators.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool that makes it easy to hide personal information on websites when you’re sharing your screen or making a video.

▬▬▬▬ WHAT IT DOES ▬▬▬▬▬

Click to hide:
Hide what you don’t want others to see by simply clicking on it.

Blurs Stay On:
Once you blur something, it stays that way until you decide to remove it.

Remove Easily:
If you need to show something again, you can clear the blur with one click.

All Local:
Everything is done in your browser.

▬▬▬▬ USEFUL FOR ▬▬▬▬▬

Professionals:
Hide sensitive business data during presentations or demos.

Creators:
Avoid showing personal details in your videos or live streams.

Educators:
Keep student information confidential during online sessions.

▬▬▬▬ GET STARTED ▬▬▬▬▬

SafeBlur is easy to install and works with your everyday browser activities.
Whether you're teaching, presenting, or creating, it helps you manage what others can see, ensuring your privacy with minimal effort.

Try SafeBlur for a simpler way to protect your privacy while sharing your screen.
